item.title: japan prohibits access to nuclear evacuation zone

item.title: our health and the luck of the draw
item.description: we like to think of medicine as a rational science, and that our attention to our lives and our bodies pays off in reasonably predictable ways. but our health and well-being is much more bound to random chance than we'd like to think.

item.title: kentucky tornado hits plant, minor injuries reported
